#labels Featured
= Process Flow =

  # Users signup by going to http://moveable-weather.appspot.com
  # They are guided through the "oauth dance", to authenticated Google Latitude to share their location data wit this app
  # They are issued an 8 digit password that is unique to their member account on Moveable Weather
  # They call the Moveable Weather access number and are prompted to enter their password
  # Each subsequent time they call
    # Based on their Google Latitude current location, they will be read the local weather
    # The can then "travel to a new location", and hit any key, to again be read the weather, or they can hang up

Note:
   For demo purposes, they can "travel to a new location" by moving their avatar to a new location on the map, inside the Google Latitude gadget on their iGoogle home page.
